import React, { useContext } from 'react' import mycontext from '../Context/Createcontext' import daily from './Daily png.png' import dicon from './delete.png' import eicon from './edit.png' import Alertcontext from '../Context/AlertContext' function Showuserdata(props) { const {Checkalert}=useContext(Alertcontext) const {DeleteNote}=useContext(mycontext) const {note,UpdateNote}=props return ( <>

{DeleteNote(note._id)}}>

{note.date} Price : {note.price} Work : {note.work} {note.dailywork}

{UpdateNote(note)}}>

) } export default Showuserdata
